name: General Support
description: Standard template for general customer support cases

workflow: 1. Check/create Customer Profile first (customer_id requires profile ARN)
2. Create custom fields if they don't exist (use cases_list_fields to check)
3. Create case with minimal required fields: title + customer_id
4. Update case with additional fields after creation
critical_notes: customer_id MUST be a profile ARN format: arn:aws:profile:{region}:{account}:domains/{domain}/profiles/{id}
SingleSelect fields require exact value matches from the options arrays
case_reason values must match options configured in the Connect instance, not this template
Create case with minimal fields first, then update - avoids validation failures

common_errors.customer_id_not_valid: Use profiles_create_profile first, then construct ARN
common_errors.field_value_doesnt_match: SingleSelect value not in allowed options - check instance config
common_errors.field_already_exists: Field exists - use cases_list_fields to get existing field IDs

requiredFields._note: Only 'title' is truly required for case creation. customer_id is system-required.

customFields.name: Priority
customFields._note: Options must be configured in Connect instance field settings

customFields.name: Description
customFields.example: Customer experiencing login issues with their account

customFields.name: Resolution Notes
customFields.example: Reset password and verified account access restored

fields.title: Customer Account Access Issue - Password Reset Required
fields.Description: Customer experiencing login issues with their account after recent password policy update
fields.Resolution Notes: Reset password and verified account access restored
